title: The humble petition of many thousands, gentlemen, free-holders, and others, of the county of Worcester, to the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. In behalf of the able, faithful, godly ministry of this nation. Delivered by Colonel Jeff Bridges, and Mr. Thomas Foly, December 22. 1652. VVith the Parliaments answer thereunto.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by Robert White, for Francis Tyton, and Thomas Underhill, and are to be sold at their shops, the three Daggers in Fleetstreet, and the Bible and Anchor in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original the British Library.
